Package com.idibon.api.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HttpInterface
    Generic interface abstracting the HTTP methods that are used by the Idibon API client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpFuture<Result extends javax.json.JsonValue>
    Wraps the result of a Future, either exceptional or succsesful in an Either monad, suppressing the thrown exception.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpInterface.Property
    Various internal configuration properties for the interface
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HttpException  
    HttpException.BadRequest
    HTTP 400
    HttpException.ClientError
    Generic superclass for all 4xx error codes
    HttpException.EntityTooLarge
    HTTP 413
    HttpException.Forbidden
    HTTP 403
    HttpException.GatewayTimeout
    HTTP 504
    HttpException.InternalServerError
    HTTP 500
    HttpException.NotFound
    HTTP 404
    HttpException.ServerError
    Generic super class for all 5xx error codes
    HttpException.ServiceUnavailable
    HTTP 503
    HttpException.Unauthorized
    HTTP 401
